name: Lost Alone Ultimate: George's Nightmare
storyline:
Immerse yourself in this psychological experiment. George's Nightmare will allow you to step into the shoes of George Tellaselv after the events of Lost Alone Ultimate.

George's Nightmare is a psychological experiment designed to push your fear resistance to the limit.
It's an experience where you'll have to collect 10 candles and place them in George's apartment cellar. Sounds like a simple task?
Well, you're wrong!
Each game will never be the same as the previous one. The experiment includes over 100 terrifying situations that will make each game unique. Objects will never be in the same place. Jump scares will be different in each game. Puzzles will change each time.

IF YOU HAVE A WEAK HEART, THIS EXPERIMENT IS NOT FOR YOU.
summary:
Find 10 candles and place them on the ritual table before the demons find you.
Your heart won't be able to withstand this psychological experiment.
